spatial_accuracy.notes: The overall room placement is mostly correct, but there are significant discrepancies. The Kitchen/Living room is heavily distorted, and the bedroom proportions are off. Door and window placements have numerous errors.

structural_fidelity.notes: There are missing walls and rooms are hallucinated. Wall thickness consistency is poor. Adjacency relationships are incorrect in several areas.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement in the kitchen is poor. The living room furniture is misrepresented and misplaced. Scale consistency is also an issue.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric and orthographic projection seems generally correct. The lighting is acceptable. However, there are some clean geometry issues and visual clarity is reduced due to structural inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen/Living room proportions are heavily distorted and significantly smaller than the floor plan.
The kitchen island/counter is completely missing in the 3D render.
The dining table and chairs in the Kitchen/Living area are missing.
Portion of the wall between the 'Kitchen/Living' and the bathroom/hallway area is missing, creating an open space not present in the floor plan.

The bathroom door is misplaced and its orientation is incorrect (E3). It opens into the hallway in the floor plan, but is shown as a sliding door system or completely open in the render in the wrong position.
The door leading to the Bedroom is missing in the render.
The door leading to the toilet/shower area within the bathroom is misplaced.
The entire staircase structure and the wall next to it is missing in the 3D render. It is replaced by a window and an open space.
Hallucinated windows where the staircase and its adjacent wall should be.
The door at the entrance (below the staircase) is missing.
The window next to the sofa in the living area is misplaced; it is further to the right and proportionally smaller.
The windows on the left side (from the perspective of the 2D plan) of the Kitchen/Living area are misrepresented and misplaced.
The windows in the master bedroom are misplaced and their number is incorrect. There are two windows in the render where the plan shows one.
The bed in the bedroom is smaller in proportion to the room than depicted in the floor plan.
The orientation of the refrigerator in the kitchen is incorrect. It's placed against the wall in the render, but shown perpendicular to the wall in the plan.
The planter boxes and vegetation on the top left and bottom left external areas are only partially represented or missing.
The kitchen counter layout has been completely reinvented and does not match the floor plan. Hallucinated counter spaces.
The wall separating the bedroom from the bathroom is significantly shorter than in the floor plan, implying an open-concept connection (E5 - Hallucinated opening).
The toilet is facing the wrong direction compared to the floor plan (E3).
The shower unit is not clearly defined or is missing in the bathroom.
